original_text: As they were coming down the mountain, Jesus gave them orders not to tell anyone what they had seen until the Son of Man had risen from the dead.
korean_text: 그들이 산에서 내려올 때에 예수께서 경고하시되 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아날 때까지는 본 것을 아무에게도 이르지 말라 하시니

sentences.original_text: As they were coming down the mountain
not to tell anyone what they had seen
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 본 것을 아무에게도 말하지 말라고

sentences.original_text: until the Son of Man had risen from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 인자가 죽은 자 가운데서 부활할 때까지
